configuration_template.pool_token_vault_0: DERIVED - Will be read from pool account
configuration_template.pool_token_vault_1: DERIVED - Will be read from pool account

configuration_template.tick_upper: REQUIRED - Upper tick for position (must ensure quote-only)

suggested_tick_range.tick_upper: TBD - Calculate based on current price
